Data: {"recipient_id": "e8dfd60e-47d9-49e9-ac06-7e019c2254ed", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": true, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
why is my card authorization failed? i tried with 2 different business cards

I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble with your card authorization. There could be several reasons for this issue. I recommend contacting your bank to resolve the payment matter or adding a different payment method. If you choose to update your account with a different payment method, don't forget to resubmit your ads! Another short-term solution is to add ad credits to your account. For more details, you can refer to our Billing Guide here: https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide.

The exact error for the card authorization failure isn't specified. It could be due to various reasons such as insufficient funds, incorrect card details, or restrictions set by your bank. I recommend contacting your bank to get more information on why the authorization failed. If you need further assistance, you can also reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
